name: Bluwb
description:
In Bluwbs you're going to play Nyamandine and help her slay waves of ennemies ! 

But here's the trick, she doesn't have any weapon to kill them... unless she bonds with them. By creating links between her and the bluwbs, she can harness their power to shoot them !

HOW TO PLAY 

WASD - Move around

Left-click - Shoot

Right-click - Create bond

Bluwb is a game made in the GMTK 2021 Game jam by three people

Mel Baumgartner : Unity programming

Meddy Pollatz : Unity programming

Ronan Cassault :  2D Graphics & Game Design
